title: Industry 4.0 Assessment: Supply Chain and Warehouse Management
description: This survey evaluates your organization's digitization and agility in supply chain and warehouse operations.

elements.name: industrySector
elements.title: Industry Sector

elements.name: companySize
elements.title: Company Size

elements.name: region
elements.title: Geographic Region

elements.name: supplierCount
elements.title: Approximately how many suppliers do you work with?

elements.name: warehouseCount
elements.title: How many warehouses or distribution centers do you operate?

pages.name: supplyChainAgility
pages.title: Supply Chain Agility
pages.description: Assessment of your supply chain's ability to quickly adapt to changes

elements.name: orderFulfillmentTime
elements.title: What is your average order fulfillment cycle time (in days)?

elements.name: forecastAccuracy
elements.title: What is your average demand forecast accuracy (percentage)?

elements.name: inventoryTurnover
elements.title: What is your inventory turnover rate (times per year)?

elements.name: disruptionRecoveryTime
elements.title: What is your average recovery time from supply disruptions (in days)?

elements.name: demandResponseCapability
elements.title: How would you rate your ability to respond to sudden demand fluctuations?
choices: Very limited - significant lead time required
Basic - can adjust with substantial delays
Moderate - can adjust with some delays
Good - can adjust quickly with minimal delays
Excellent - can adjust in near real-time

elements.name: supplyChainVisibility
elements.title: What level of visibility do you have across your supply chain?
choices: Real-time tracking of goods in transit
End-to-end visibility from raw materials to customer delivery
Limited or no visibility beyond our own operations

elements.name: supplierCollaboration
elements.title: Rate your level of digital collaboration with suppliers

elements.name: alternateSourcesStrategy
elements.title: What strategies do you employ for supply chain resilience?

elements.name: supplyChainSystems
elements.title: Which supply chain management systems or technologies do you use?

elements.name: dataExchangeMethods
elements.title: How do you exchange data with supply chain partners?

elements.name: supplierIntegration
elements.title: Rate the level of system integration with your suppliers

elements.name: customerIntegration
elements.title: Rate the level of system integration with your customers

elements.name: advancedSupplyChainTech
elements.title: Which advanced technologies are you using in your supply chain?

pages.name: warehouseDigitization
pages.title: Warehouse Management Digitization
pages.description: Assessment of the digital technologies in your warehouse operations

elements.name: warehouseSystems
elements.title: Which warehouse management systems or technologies do you use?

elements.name: inventoryAccuracy
elements.title: What is your current inventory accuracy rate (percentage)?

elements.name: realTimeInventory
elements.title: Do you have real-time inventory visibility?

elements.name: digitalizedWarehouseProcesses
elements.title: Which warehouse processes have been digitized?

elements.name: pickingAccuracy
elements.title: What is your current order picking accuracy rate (percentage)?

elements.name: pickingSpeed
elements.title: What is your average picking rate (items per hour per worker)?

elements.name: warehouseAutomation
elements.title: Rate your overall level of warehouse automation

elements.name: warehouseAdvancedTech
elements.title: Which advanced technologies are you using in your warehouses?

elements.name: warehouseAnalytics
elements.title: How advanced are your warehouse analytics capabilities?
choices: Advanced analytics with some predictive capabilities

elements.name: automatedProcessPercentage
elements.title: What percentage of your warehouse processes are fully automated?

elements.name: digitizedProcessPercentage
elements.title: What percentage of your warehouse processes are digitized (but not fully automated)?

pages.name: performanceMetrics
pages.title: Supply Chain and Warehouse Performance Metrics

elements.name: perfectOrderRate
elements.title: What is your perfect order rate (percentage of orders delivered complete, accurate, and on time)?

elements.name: daysOfInventory
elements.title: What is your average days of inventory on hand?

elements.name: carrierOnTimeDelivery
elements.title: What is your carrier on-time delivery rate (percentage)?

elements.name: warehouseCostPerOrder
elements.title: What is your average warehouse cost per order processed?

elements.name: performanceTracking
elements.title: Rate your ability to track these metrics in real-time

elements.name: plannedInvestments
elements.title: In which areas are you planning to invest in the next 2 years?

elements.name: biggestChallenges
elements.title: What are your biggest challenges in supply chain and warehouse digitization?

elements.name: digitalTransformationBudget
elements.title: What percentage of your supply chain budget is allocated to digital transformation?

elements.name: additionalInsights
elements.title: Please share any additional insights about your supply chain and warehouse digitization journey

completedHtml: Thank you for completing the Supply Chain and Warehouse Management assessment!
